name: Portgas.D.Ace
text: On Play: If you have a face-up Life card, play up to 1 [Sabo], [Portgas.D.Ace] or [Monkey.D.Luffy] with a cost of 2 from your hand or trash.

effect.text: If you have a face-up Life card, play up to 1 [Sabo], [Portgas.D.Ace] or [Monkey.D.Luffy] with a cost of 2 from your hand or trash.
